detail_desc: Baby Exclusive. Trousers in an airy weave with a frill-trimmed, elasticated waistband and a drawstring. Side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Leather mules with leather insoles and rubber soles.
Sports trousers in stretch jersey with elasticated ribbing at the waist, side pockets with a concealed zip and a ventilating mesh section at the crotch.
Necklace with three metal chains in various designs, one with a round pendant with a marble-patterned plastic bead. Adjustable length.

Suit trousers in woven fabric containing some wool with a zip fly, side pockets, welt back pockets and legs with creases. Slim fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Thin metal chain necklace with a pendant. Adjustable length, 42-47 cm.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, long raglan sleeves, diagonal front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, straight-cut jacket in a sturdy, textured weave with a small stand-up collar, press-studs down the front and pockets in the side seams. Lined.
Fully lined printed swimsuit.

Dress in an airy weave with an elasticated flounce at the top. Narrow, adjustable shoulder straps with a decorative bow at the top, an elasticated seam at the waist and a gently flared skirt with a flounce at the hem.
Short, A-line skirt with a high waist and buttons down the front.
Sun hats in a soft cotton weave. Lined. Width of brim 5.5 cm.
Sandals with wide, crossover straps, square toes and low heels. Satin linings, imitation leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 1.5 cm.
Treggings in stretch cotton twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly with a decorative button and front and back pockets.

Jacket in water-repellent cotton with a detachable hood, press-studs at the top and a zip down one side. Elastication around the hood and cuffs. Rounded and slightly longer at the back. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Notebook in faux fur with appliqués in the shape of a shimmering unicorn horn and ears. Refillable. Size 12x15.5 cm.
Jumper in a textured cotton-blend knit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Top in soft cotton jersey with short puff sleeves.
Short-sleeved top in linen jersey with a round neck and rounded hem.
Straight-cut satin dress with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a sewn-on bow and slit at the cuffs. Lined.
Washed cotton twill chinos in a relaxed fit with a regular waist, zip fly and button, side pockets, welt back pockets and tapered legs. Tapered fit.
Brazilian briefs in lace with a low waist, lined gusset and high cut at the back.
Hairband with a knot detail at the front and covered elastic at the back.
Short, sleeveless top in soft jersey with a draped wrapover detail at the hem.
5-pocket, low rise, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a zip fly and button and tapered legs.
Suede boots with a soft, wrinkled shaft. pointed toes and covered block heels. Fabric linings, leather insoles and rubber soles. Heel 9.5 cm.
Jumper in a soft cable knit containing some wool with long raglan sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Sleeveless, calf-length dress in soft viscose jersey with a tie detail at the top of the front, seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Lined at the top.
Handbag in hole-patterned plastic with handles at the top and a decorative, fruit-shaped pendant in imitation leather. Size 10x19x25 cm.

Short-sleeved shirt in a cotton and linen blend with a concealed button-down collar and classic front. Open chest pocket, yoke with a pleat at the back, and a rounded hem. Slim fit with an accentuated waist and narrow shoulders to create a fitted silhouette.
Jacket in soft sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, lined hood, zip down the front, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.

department_name: Sneakers small girl inactive from s2
detail_desc: Mesh trainers with imitation leather details, a lightly padded edge and tongue, lacing at the front and a loop at the back. Mesh linings and insoles and rubber soles.
MRS MIGHETTO x H&M/BABY EXCLUSIVE. Elasticated hairband in soft cotton jersey with bendy ears.
Shorts in washed stretch denim with hard-worn details, an adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y) and zip fly and button. Front and back pockets and raw-edge, frayed hems with lace trims.

Oxford cotton shirt with a button-down collar, classic front and open chest pocket. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, a yoke with a pleat and hanger at the back, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Sandals with an adjustable ankle strap with a metal buckle. Imitation leather linings and insoles and rubber soles. Covered heels 8 cm.
Jacket in coloured denim with worn details, a collar, buttons down the front, flap chest pockets with a button and side pockets. Adjustable tab at the sides of the hem and buttons at the cuffs.
Fully lined swimsuit with a V-neck, padded cups, decorative, sewn-in lacing at the top, wide shoulder straps and a seam under the bust.
Sports jacket in fast-drying functional fabric with a hood, small stand-up collar and zip down the front.
Shirt in an airy linen weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and a yoke with a pleat at the back. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Blouse in a soft viscose weave with embroidery at the top, a collar and buttons down the front. 3/4-length sleeves with narrow elastication, a flounce and decorative ties at the cuffs.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a ribbed neckline.
5-pocket jeans in washed stretch denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim legs.
Top in airy linen jersey with short flounced sleeves and a deep V-neck with buttons at the top.
Sleeveless blouse woven in a cotton blend with buttons and pin-tucks with lace insets at the front. Frills down the front and around the armholes and a yoke with a pleat at the back.
Lined balconette bikini top with underwired, lightly padded cups, side support and decorative gathers at the front. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps and a fastener at the back.
Shirt in woven fabric with a collar, concealed buttons down the front, long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed, sturdy cotton denim with a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Temporary body tattoos in various sizes and designs, 14 of which are glow-in-the-dark.

Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton blend with an easy-iron finish. Turn-down collar, classic front, narrow cuffs with adjustable buttoning, darts at the back and a rounded hem. Slim fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.

Set with a hat and mittens in windproof, water-repellent functional fabric with folded seams and reflective details. Padded mittens with rubber reinforced sections on the palms and thumb for a firmer grip, a high shaft with an adjustable hook and loop tab and elastication at the top, and a plastic hook-and-eye fastening to keep the mittens together. Thinsulate™ lining. Padded hat with a turned-up peak, earflaps and a hook and loop fastening under the chin, Lining in faux fur and fleece.
Long-sleeved cardigan in a soft, loose-knit viscose blend. No fasteners.

Padded ski jacket in wind- and water-repellent, breathable functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood with an elasticated edge and hook and loop tab at the back. Waterproof zip down the front, zipped side pockets and a zipped sleeve pocket. Hook and loop tab and inner ribbing with thumbholes at the cuffs, a snow flap with press-studs and reinforced elastication at the waist, and an elastic drawstring at the hem. Reflective details. Lined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Quilted, padded gilet in woven fabric with a high collar and detachable, faux-fur trimmed hood. Zip down the front and discreet side pockets with a concealed zip. Lined.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in stretch, wide-wale cotton corduroy with a high waist, zip fly and button, and straight legs with raw-edge hems.
Fully lined, 5-pocket skinny-fit jeans in washed denim with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly with a press-stud.
Short-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a turn-down collar, classic front, chest pocket and rounded hem. Easy-iron finish.
Boxy top in sweatshirt fabric with a motif on the front, dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short, fitted T-shirt in cotton jersey with a round, rib-trimmed neckline.
Off-the-shoulder top in a viscose weave with elastication and a flounce at the top, 3/4-length sleeves with a slit and tie detail at the cuffs, and a rounded hem.
Short shorts in a stretch cotton blend with an elasticated waist, fake front pockets, real back pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with long sleeves, buttons down the front and short slits in the sides. Ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Cropped T-shirt in jersey with a chest pocket and short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups.
Long-sleeved jersey top with a reversible sequin motif on the front (size 2-3Y with normal sequins). Slightly longer at the back with a gently rounded hem.
Long-sleeved dress in a cotton weave with buttons at the back of the neck, a yoke with decorative gathers front and back, and elastication at the cuffs. Unlined.
Calf-length dress in soft jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a round neckline and cap sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups. Covered elastication at the waist, and slits in the sides. Unlined.

Shoulder bag in soft suede with imitation leather details. Narrow shoulder strap with a knot at each end, a zip at the top and a zipped inner compartment. Satin lining made from recycled polyester. Depth 13 cm. Height 13 cm. Width 32 cm.
Cropped top in soft, ribbed jersey with a V-neck, straight cut at the back and narrow shoulder straps.
All-in-one suit in sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, front pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Joggers in cotton twill with elasticated ribbing and a drawstring at the waist, side pockets and a back pocket. Legs with quilted sections, shaping seams at the knees and elasticated hems.

Short-sleeved shirt in a patterned cotton weave with a turn-down collar and classic front. Two chest pockets with a button, yoke with a hanger loop at the back and a rounded hem. Regular fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently shaped waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Jumper in a soft, textured knit with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Metal hoop earrings with a small plastic bead. Length 3.8 cm.
Vest top in fast-drying, breathable functional fabric with a print motif on the front and contrasting colour details. Regular fit.
Sleeveless blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with a V-neck, gathered yoke at the shoulders and back, and a wide smocked seam under the bust.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with reversible sequins on the front and a narrow ribbed trim around the neckline.

Shorts in a linen and cotton blend with concealed, adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist and a zip fly and press-stud. Diagonal front pockets, welt back pockets and a small fabric appliqué at the hem of one leg.
Rain coat in water-repellent fabric with welded seams, a drawstring hood, press-studs down the front and flap patch pockets with a press-stud. Unlined.
Fully lined, spotted swimsuit with a flounce at the top that continues over one shoulder. Narrow shoulder strap over the other shoulder.
